thing-type.label: ZME_06443 Single Paddle Wall Controller
thing-type.description: Single Paddle Wall Controller<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThe battery wall controller is a Z-Wave device that can act as controller. This means that it can built its own Z-Wave network by including and managing other devices but it can also be included into a different Z-Wave controllers network and act as a secondary controller.</p&gt <p&gtThe rocker can be used to control other Z-Wave devices or send scene control command to an IP gateway. The device has two independent control channels - in Z-Wave language Association groups – that can be operated by single and double click of the rocker.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPress the button “Inclusion” for 2 seconds. The LED will start shining green.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtTriple click the button “Exclusion”. The LED will start blinking. </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtTriple click on either the button “Down” or the button “Up” will issue a Node Information Frame and keep the device awake for 2 sec afterwards.</p&gt
